content: *add a touch of traditional flair to your kitchen decor with this classic dishcloth yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds * main color mc red 00095 *1 ball or 20 m/22 yds* * contrast a white 00001 *1 ball or 14 m/16 yds* * contrast b yellow 00010 *1 ball or 23 m/26 yds* --- video tutorial 1 1 https //www yarnspirations com/video-y-crochet-corner-to-corner-dishcloth html
